dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains statistics on for sections of population including age groups and sex from the 2014 Census of Guatemala. The census information was collected by the Instituto Nacional de Estadisticas in Guatemala in April of 2014. The questionnaire and survey report for this census is included with this download.  These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production.
